channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Review - 'Spiritual Letters'
item.description: I recently watched “Spiritual Letters - The Art of Mr. Paradox Paradise”. That was an interesting experience on different levels. As the movie title ‘Spiritual Letters’ indicates, this movie is about letters, but also about the spiritual journey of artist Mr. Paradox Paradise. Furthermore, this movie was my first application of crypto currencies and what some people call Web3. This blog post will be structured accordingly. You can find the movie trailer on YouTube.

item.title: AWS certified SA-A
item.description: Yiiiiieeehaaaa! Finally ‘AWS certified Solution Architect - Associate’.

item.title: To The Moon
item.description: A first streetart experiment with our son (4a). He is obsessed with rockets and space right now. See details in Twitter feed. Mixing science and street art with our son (4a): A stencil graffiti celebrating @NASA 's #Apollo program with a depiction of the Saturn V rocket. There are a few details I would like to mention. A thread (1/7): pic.twitter.com/4Xg9WRXXhh — David (@davidbeckonline) September 7, 2021

item.title: Show Your Stripes
item.description: The recent weather extremes in Germany and other parts of the world reminded a lot a of people about climate change. I think that the #ShowYourStripes Link to ShowYourStripes is a beautiful but scary reminder of what is going on. #showyourstripes

item.description: In this post I am testing images. You should see a featured_image on top and the same image below.

item.title: Hello World.
item.description: Starting again with a hugo based website running on AWS Amplify. For more information on agile website delivery with Hugo and AWS, you might want to check out this documentation. Hello World.
